dict.acceptation: 质量，品质；美质，优点；才能，能力，技能，素养；品种；
优质的，高质量的；上流社会的；

sent.orig: There are appearance quality, nutrient quality, edible quality and sanitation quality sense of vegetable soybeans quality.
sent.trans: 鲜食大豆的品质指标包括外观品质、营养品质、食味品质、卫生品质。

sent.orig: Trilogy refers to the quality of quality planning, quality improvement and quality control.
sent.trans: 质量三部曲指的是质量策划、质量改进和质量控制。

sent.orig: Top-Grade Quality: The pursuit of better quality and combination of moral quality, product and enterprise quality.
sent.trans: 追求品质至上，追求三品合一，即人品、产品、企品。

sent.orig: We have good reputation among our customers oversea: quality products, quality shipping and quality service.
sent.trans: 我们有良好的声誉是我们的海外客户：优质的产品，优质的航运和优质的服务。

sent.orig: General Manager approve the issue of quality policy, quality objective and quality commitment.
sent.trans: 由总经理批准发布质量方针、质量目标和质量承诺。
